name: Nemesis
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You mystically mark yourself as a target creature's fated nemesis. Whenever you are within 120 feet of the creature, it knows your current location. In exchange, you gain the following benefits:
>You always know the target's location.
>When you deal damage to your target, one damage die you choose is set to its highest value. The value of this die is additionally deducted from their maximum hit points.
>When the target is reduced to half of their maximum hit points, it must make an Intuition saving throw with disadvantage to avoid being frightened until it is no longer within 120 feet of you. This ignores a creature's immunity to being frightened.
>You have advantage on all saving throws forced by the creature.

The spell normally lasts for 1 minute. If you reduce a creature to half of their maximum hit points, the spell's duration becomes permanent.

The spell ends if you are reduced to 0 hit points by the target, or if the target is killed. You can't cast this spell again until it ends.
empower: Empower this spell only after ending the spell by killing the target. Up to twelve associates of the target are marked as your nemesis.
